description: This rich and smokey casserole is a one pot wonder with hearty black beans.
name: Smokey Pork & Black Bean Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the lid, stir in the black beans and cook uncovered for a further 30 minutes until the sauce has reduced and the pork is tender.
